markdown:
<title level="1" right="Skill " pfs="">[Industry](/Skills.aspx?ID=25)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 525</row>

Industry measures the kingdom’s devotion to the business of building and making things, from basic necessities to luxury goods for trade. It puts people to work creating a prosperous future.

<title level="2">Industry Untrained General Actions</title>

- [Establish Settlement](/Skills.aspx?ID=12&General=true) 

- [Focused Attention](/Skills.aspx?ID=14&General=true) 

<title level="2">Related Feats</title>

To see a list of Feats related to Industry, [click here](/feats?include-traits=skill&exclude-traits=archetype&include-skills=industry&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc).

<title level="2">Industry Untrained Actions</title>

<title level="2">Industry Trained Actions</title>
